Seul Lee

About Me

I'm a M.S. student at Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (MLAI) lab in KAIST,
under the supervision of Pro.Sung Ju Hwang. I obtained my B.S. degrees (Aerospace Engineering, Biological Sciences) at KAIST.
My research interests ~.
